storyInfo: The 'Matriarch', administrator of the Shrine of Nurtury, demonstrates an all-accommodating future for Laterano to the Gun-Knight Patrizion. Exusiai convinces the firearms workshop's apprentice to help her build explosives.

attributes.content: Madam Extra, you must take your nutrition...
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: I said, I don't want it.
attributes.name: Extra

attributes.content: If you have specific dietary requirements, we can make efforts to accommodate them.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: *Sarkaz expletive*, you think I'm a picky eater?
attributes.name: Extra

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: Yes, you have beds and food, and your leader... that 'Matriarch' said you wouldn't do anything to me.
attributes.name: Extra

attributes.content: But I just don't feel comfortable.
attributes.name: Extra

attributes.content: In the wilderness, I know what can kill me, and I know what I need to do to give birth to this baby.
attributes.name: Extra

attributes.content: Where to hunt, how to keep warm, how to block off the entrance to my cave... And with that, I don't have to worry about myself or my baby.
attributes.name: Extra

attributes.content: But here... ugh.
attributes.name: Extra

attributes.content: Get out. Take the food with you. I didn't touch it. I'm sure there are people who need it more in this place.
attributes.name: Extra

attributes.content: Reverend Gun-Knight Patrizion?
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: Yes. The Matriarch was looking for me?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: She's inside. A minute, please.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: The Matriarch has been tending to the pregnant Sarkaz woman who arrived in poor shape. But it's been an hour and she hasn't come out yet...
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: I'm not one to speculate... but the prejudices of the past have made it difficult for many Sarkaz to accept our kindness.
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: The Matriarch has no weapons on her. I worry that...
attributes.name: Nurturer

attributes.content: I'll check on her.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: The gun-knight Patrizion has served Laterano for many decades. He has forgiven many Sarkaz, and slaughtered many more.
He has heard the Sarkaz curse in fury, cry out in pain, roar in hatred, even plead in despair...
But he has never heard them pray.
And yet, the pregnant Sarkaz now kneels before a holy statue, her hands clasped together, stumbling over the unfamiliar words of liturgy.
The Matriarch stands behind her, her head bowed in prayer as well, the pair bathing in the warm glow. When the Sarkaz trips over a sentence, the Matriarch waits for her.
All mortals desire peace and happiness, and fear hardship and sorrow.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Therefore, we stand together in prayer, regardless of race.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Matriarch, the Sarkaz...
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: She has only just left behind the restless life of a wanderer. Now that she is experiencing idleness for the first time in her life, all the worries she has never had time to ponder have rushed to the surface.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: She simply needs to learn to comfort herself.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: You taught her how to pray?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: We've only recited a few verses together.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Let's go somewhere where we won't disturb her.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Why have you called me here today, Matriarch?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: I wanted to talk with you, to ease your troubles.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: But it seems like words may not be so necessary now.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Troubles? I am not troubled.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Are you not troubled, or do you dare not be troubled?
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Everyone in Laterano knows that our ancient order was established in response to the prophesied calamity.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: As calamity descends, our order is stretched to its limit... yet no one can predict what will become of Laterano one day.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: I cannot imagine it, but I have faith it will be beautiful.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: You have given too much for it. The granddaughter you never have time to be with, the old friend whose name you've forgotten, and the other old friends you've exiled as guardian of order...
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: To deny Laterano's future is to deny everything that you have given and sacrificed for it. It is to deny yourself.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Have no fear. A sliver of that future has already revealed itself to you.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: If the faith of Laterano can bring comfort even to the faithless, if Sarkaz can pray side-by-side with Sankta...
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Then our order shall open its arms to all.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: There will be no barriers, no one left behind, no unwilling partings.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Sounds like you're describing a dream.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Are we not about to lift the veil that separates dream from reality, before the eyes of all?
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: A miracle will befall this land when everyone believes that even the most fantastical dream can become reality.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: The Nativity must go off without a hitch, Patrizion.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: I'll do my best, Matriarch.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: You're blocking the screen, 'Holy Debt Collector'!
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: You're the one who decided to sit that far back... not that you're missing anything if I block a few scenes. It's just Eight-Armed Chainsaw Guy, after all.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: And stop quoting random lines from the movie. You're not on a mission or in a briefing. You're in my house!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I kind of like that name. Maybe you can use it as your code name for your next mission.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Not you too, Lemuen...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You two sure can work together, when it comes to making up bad code names.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Haha.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: How's life as a cardinal, Lemuen? Keeping busy?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Busier than when I was in a wheelchair.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: When was it that you got out of it for good, anyway? I don't remember.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: You don't really care much about me, do you? I'm so sad, and the only thing that can comfort me is if you let me feel your horns.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Why don't you ask if Holy Debt Collector might let you touch her ear plumage?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Go ahead. I don't mind.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I never thought it would be the Summit of Nations that brought us back together after all this time.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: It's like every Lateran out there got called back to the city.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I can understand Legati like Mostima getting recalled, but the old man brought me back when I was in the middle of a high-priority mission to Sargon!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Say, where is your grandpa anyway? He's the one throwing the party, right?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Should be back soon.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Who knows what he's up to? All he said was that since he was retiring, he wanted to make an important announcement while everyone's still here.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: It's nice to see the kids having fun when I get home from work. Makes me feel ten years younger.
That still makes you really old, Patrizion.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Reverend Gun-Knight.
attributes.name: Mostima & Lemuen

attributes.content: Now, now, are you angry at me for being late, Fia?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: I had to turn the office upside-down, trying to find this thing.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: What's in the package, Reverend?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Open it. Find out for yourself.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Wow! A guardian gun?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Looks like it's been around for a while.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Patrizion. Unless my eyes deceive me...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: The first patron firearm I ever had. I picked it when I was twelve. It stayed with me for over a decade, until I became a gun-knight.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Soon, it'll become a true relic, when firearms workshops fade into the history of Laterano.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Take it, Fia.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: A little token. Think of it as fulfilling an old man's wish.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: As your mentor, your guardian, some of what I did was... how should I put it...? Regrettable.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: You know you weren't the only student I cared for. But I was never a licensed teacher. The other one should have walked a better path.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Aurela, the gun-knight who killed her cohort? That's a whole different thing.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: If I never walk that 'better path', it's not because of anything so drastic.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: It's because you don't have the little whatsis I have over my head. I know.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: But I took you in precisely because you were Liberi.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: You never told me that.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: What regret are you trying to make up for this time?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: *sigh*... I didn't want to tell you.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: The loss of a friendship made me realize that I never truly knew a Liberi.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: I thought I was too clumsy. I thought I could learn to get along with the Liberi.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: But I was never very good at it.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: I worried about your nerves that were constantly on edge, about your obsession over the accident, the anger that boiled within you, and how you struggled to fit in...
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: But I never knew how to guide you.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: For the Sankta, empathy is a window that helps us understand each other. For you, it became a wall that kept you out.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Hold it, hold it right there—
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Do old people always get so sentimental?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Haha. You don't get it.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: What I'm trying to tell you is that everything is going to change after the Summit of Nations.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: The prohibition on patron firearms for non-Sankta will be lifted, along with other rules like it. The Law's acceptance of the Liberi will extend far beyond just allowing you to live in the Holy City.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: We will truly become one people, Fia.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Do you think it's enough to just issue a few edicts, close a few workshops, build a shrine, and take in some wanderers?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: See? That's your first reaction.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: It means that, deep down, you want to share true understanding with Lemuen, with Mostima... with us.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: You will understand, Fia.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Then, if you're willing, you can take my place and become a true gun-knight... or go and do whatever else you want to, things that were once open only to the Sankta.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: When that day comes, your friends will be there to bear witness, as they do now.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Now, take your guardian gun for a spin.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Fiammetta does not fully understand what the old man said, and her two friends say nothing, but everyone present smiles at her.
Fiammetta raises the old patron firearm.
She has held many grenade launchers in her time, but she feels a strange sensation come over her as she touches the gun's barrel, like a terrestrial creature touching the sea for the first time.
She cannot tell if the indescribable connection among Sanktas has opened itself to her, or if it is simply a reaction to Patrizion's words.
We were born different, Fia, but our paths must eventually converge.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Nothing makes an old man happier than recognition from his child.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Fiammetta holds the gun tightly and lines up the sights with the door.
Fiammetta... it's been a while.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Did you invite him, Lemuen?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I knew he was coming, that's all.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: It was I who invited him.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Letting go of hatred is also part of achieving true understanding.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Is there anything I can help with, El? To make up for me not recognizing you.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Not so fast.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: There's a few things about Laterano I'm really interested in... it's been a long time since I've been here.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: When did the Curia decide to shut down every firearms workshop in the city?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: It was recent... the edict was sent to all the workshops in the city on the same day.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: It wasn't that much of a surprise... arms control had been around for as long as I could remember, and it was about time they turned their attention to reforming gun control, after all these years.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Don't you find it strange?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Should I?
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Magister Paganini said there was nothing unusual about shops shutting down and opening up. He'd been talking about closing up for years.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: But this is a firearms workshop!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: D-Does that make a difference?
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: This is where all Sanktas meet their guardian guns!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Have all of you forgotten the meaning a Sankta's patron firearm carries?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: El, what are you doing?
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Exusiai takes out a patron firearm and puts it on the workbench.
She smoothly disassembles it, from the magazine to the barrel to the action to the case ejector...
I'm not a terrorist, or some kind of super-mercenary. I just know my guns like I know my own joints.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I remember how I came into possession of each and every gun—yes, ALL of them.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: But the one that left the deepest impression on me was the first one, when I stepped into this little shop, along with my parents and my sister...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Exusiai's hands do not slow down even as she continues talking.
My sister told me that every Sankta has their very own patron firearm, or guardian gun, the same as we were born with our unique halos.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: So, picking a guardian gun is like making a friend.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: We place our trust in empathy, open our hearts to one another, and learn to get along.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You were what, four or five years-old at the time? You were tiny, didn't have a halo, and you couldn't even talk. We didn't even notice you.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: By the time we knew you were there, you had your hands on the scope I had picked, feeling it with a face full of curiosity...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Magister Paganini said he found me in the gardens of an Ecclesia Requietum, and brought me back to this workshop.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: I seem to have, er, problems with speech, and he thought I was mute at first. It took a few years for me to be able to put a few syllables together.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: I caused him so many headaches. I was never the kind of kid he could be proud of. I sneaked out that day, without even knowing why, and I was so anxious I almost cried...
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Put your hand on it, Vani, just like old times.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Hesitantly, tentatively, Vannini puts her hand on it.
Master Pag put my hand-picked parts together. My mind filled with thoughts when I held it in my hand...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Protect my parents and sister, make new friends, have the coolest graduation ceremony in Laterano... it told me I could do all that.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You felt it, didn't you?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: The stuff you just said wasn't what I remembered at all, Vani.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I remember that I picked my guardian gun with a little girl I didn't know. We watched the fowlbeasts across the street, used the barrel as a talk tube...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: She didn't talk, but I could feel what was in her heart when we played together with the parts. That's why I knew she was happy when I saw her reddened eyes at the end.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: This is our secret. That's why I didn't say anything to my sis when she asked if I was bullying you.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: For me, that wasn't the day I made one friend. It was the day I made two.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Exusiai brandishes her gun, which she has already reassembled, and smiles at the young apprentice gunsmith.
Vannini has her eyes fixed on Exusiai, that sense of confidence and pride that was on her face throughout the process.
Vannini cannot tell where the confidence and pride came from. It is almost like Exusiai is saying, 'I'm a Sankta, and this is a Sankta thing.'
What is it, Vani?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Well, I basically recreated what happened... you still don't remember anything?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (Shakes head)
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: B-But I believe you, El.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Uh... huh?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I was really sad when Magister Paganini told me this workshop would have to close.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: I thought it was because I've lived here for so long with him that I didn't want to leave...
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: I believe you about this link that you say patron firearms bring us, El... even though it means that something has happened to the Holy City that I can't comprehend.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Yeah!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: How can I help?
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: You've been here in the firearms workshop for so long. Surely you've got a way to help me make an explosion that will shake the city?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Is Fia alright?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Mostima is with her.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You know what she's like. It's not so easy for her to forgive.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: What about Andoain?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: He left.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: If there's anyone who has a right to be angry, it would be you, Lemuen. You were the one who suffered the most.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: I can't argue with that, Reverend.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: But all emotions change with time.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: In the five years that I spent in that coma, Andoain served his sentence in a nomadic abbey, traveling across Terra, offering assistance to our scattered kin as his way of atoning...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Finally, he decided to come back to Laterano, reintegrating as an ordinary Nurturer.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Laterano needs him, and he deserves a second chance.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I'm glad you think that way... what was it you wanted to talk to me about?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Still Fiammetta. You know she insisted on taking firearms courses when she was in school.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: She was always the first to show up for class, and the last to leave the firing range. She loved guns in a way nobody could ever doubt... even though she never learned to use one.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: But when you gave her your gun and that speech, that look in her eyes...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I couldn't tell if it was doubt or disappointment, but the one thing I know is that it wasn't pure joy.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Is that right...? I thought she would be happy. At least, before Andoain showed up.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: I still don't understand how she feels, after all these years...
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Your announcement took me by surprise, let alone Fiammetta.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: 'The prohibition on patron firearms for non-Sankta will be lifted, along with other rules like it.' That part.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Yet the arms control that we've been pushing for so long has only now come to its most important stage.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You mean the two policies conflict?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: What I want to ask is, have you received any further revelations?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Have greater goals been bestowed upon our arms control work?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: The goal has never changed. All forms of control exist so that everyone will be able to use guns more efficiently, more widely.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: The firearms workshops have a long history, but also plenty of flaws. Gunsmiths and customers both put way too much energy into them, trying to make each and every gun unique.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Once the Shrine of Gunsmithing in Pagus Michaelion starts operating for real, Laterano will be able to provide armed support to all nations and all races, when we have to.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: If the goal has never changed, why do the changes of the present seem so sudden, so... out of place?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Maybe because we're not so great at imagining the future.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: You're right that the Matriarch has bestowed a greater revelation upon me. All will partake of the same revelation at the Nativity.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: When the time comes, it won't be just you and Fia; millions of people will gain insight into the future, both inside and outside Laterano.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: You're sharp, Lemuen, and I'm sure you understand that our first priority is to make sure that the Nativity goes off without a hitch.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: I will continue to hunt the criminal trying to blow things up at this important time.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Leave. Now.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I don't want to see your face.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: In the end, the gathering parted on less-than-pleasant terms.
He had spent much time mulling over Patrizion's invitation before accepting it.

He was not unprepared for what might happen. But with a new dawn about to break in Laterano, he had decided to come and visit old friends, for reasons that he could not, or would not, put into clear words.
What will become of the past once the new Laterano comes?
He wanted a confirmation, nothing more.
The wind brings a cloud that casts a tiny shadow in a corner of the street. Andoain frowns.
He takes a few steps, then stops and waves over a confessional.
Automated Confessional CONFESS-47, at your service. Please insert your Signa Creditorum or citizen credit card before beginning your confession.
attributes.name: Automated Confessional

attributes.content: Sorry, I just remembered I have something else I need to do.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: It's you.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Is something the matter? Were you being followed?
attributes.name: Nurturer A

attributes.content: Was that why you waved over a confessional? To check your surroundings? Do we need to call the guards?
attributes.name: Nurturer A

attributes.content: No, I guess I was just imagining things.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Were you looking for me?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: The Matriarch has returned to the Shrine of Nurtury.
attributes.name: Nurturer B

attributes.content: We came to take you back.
attributes.name: Nurturer A

attributes.content: Welcome back, Cardinal Lemuen.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: Here are the handover documents for five firearms workshops in Pagus Faber. This one's owner, Paganini, has signed the papers.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: Good work. The Notarial Hall can take the rest.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Speaking of which, there are some exceptional circumstances with the workshop on Via Borgos...
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: The owner, Paganini, has an apprentice who is going to take her qualification exam. The Curia will have to provide some form of compensation now that the shop has been shut down.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: Her name is Vannini, I think. I happened to pass by her when I left... she had fiery red hair and a bright smile on her face. A really sunny disposition.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: Via Borgos... sounds familiar.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Look at the files on your terminal, Amos.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: That description does not fit Vannini.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Oh—I...
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: It's alright. Maybe just a passerby. You said she was a Sankta with fiery red hair?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: She had a hood up, but we were walking towards each other. I got a good look.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: (Why?)
attributes.name: Lemuen
